node.title: The shortest distance between my keyboard and the Monastery is:
node.author: davido

data.field: A straight line A great circle A rhumb line An infinite number of infintessimly small distances A quantum leap A leap of faith Through the Saintly teleport booth Seven leagues under the sea To hell and back A hop, skip, and a jump Through a wormhole MapQuest can't find it traceroute is down, I'm lost
